title: Travelling soon? Must-have travel essentials | International | Travel | Toronto
text:
Are you getting ready to travel but just can't seem to pack the right way? Are you the person who always has too much stuff?
Photo Galleries
12 things travellers forget (and how to make do without them)
10 tips for packing light
Packing personality: What your suitcase says about you
Well, don't you fret, our wanderlust friends, because we have compiled a few of our favourite travel essentials. Grab your passport and get to packing! Video by Celeb TV.
What's the best thing to pack for a trip?
